title: Six Familiar Essays
sourceDesc: Astell’s [Six Familiar Essays] were published in 1696. This first and only edition is our copytext. The text here derives from the transcription of the work from EEBO-TCP.

SIX
Familiar Essays
UPON
Marriage, 
 Crosses in Love, 
 Sickness, 
 Death, 
 Loyalty, 
 and Friendship.
